name: Virtual Army: Revolution
detailed_description:
Virtual Army: Revolution(VA:R) is a fast paced arcade multiplayer shooter for Virtual Reality.
Casual gameplay with ranking and progression, simplified weapon mechanics and quick rounds.

General
  • Casual/arcade gameplay
  • Simplified weapon mechanics
  • Play standing or seated
  • Pancake (Mouse & Keyboard) support
  • No waiting times
  • Arcade mode for commercial venues

Features
  • 5 v 5 online multiplayer
  • 10 maps
  • 4 game modes: Free-For-All, Team Deathmatch, Domination, Gun Game
  • Reloading - Automatic & Manual(Optional)
  • Progression: Ranking, unlocks, weapon skins and attachments
  • Crosshairs
  • Bots - online/offline play
  • Smooth & snap rotation
  • Weapon switch - Touchpad
